TopicTitle: Why is my ship's engine not working?

Articles.Content:
I recently built a ship in orbit, but the engine isn't working.

https://imgur.com/xkPoCVnhttps://imgur.com/xkPoCVn

the engine is the 2.5m nuclear engine from restock+

mods installed:
https://imgur.com/BWugCzp

It was built in orbit, and I sent the fuel up later

It's hard to tell from that picture alone, but it sounds like a fuel flow issue? The first thing to check would probably be those docking ports - you can enable/disable crossed on them by right-clicking.
it says propellant requirements not met. maybe some part is blocking fuel transfer
